01797                                         pendingHead0 = e;
01798                                 }
01799                                 e->next = pendingTail0;
01800                                 pendingTail0 = e;
01801 
01802                                 e = e->reverse;
01803                                 if (pendingTail1)
01804                                 {
01805                                         pendingTail1->next = e;
01806                                 }
01807                                 else
01808                                 {
01809                                         pendingHead1 = e;
01810                                 }
01811                                 e->prev = pendingTail1;
01812                                 pendingTail1 = e;
01813                         }
01814                         
01815                         Edge* e0 = min0;
01816                         Edge* e1 = min1;
01817 
01818 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01819                         printf("   Found min edges to %d %d\n", e0 ? e0->target->point.index : -1, e1 ? e1->target->point.index : -1);
01820 #endif
01821 
01822                         if (cmp == 0)
01823                         {
01824                                 findEdgeForCoplanarFaces(c0, c1, e0, e1, NULL, NULL);
01825                         }
01826 
01827                         if ((cmp >= 0) && e1)
01828                         {
01829                                 if (toPrev1)
01830                                 {
01831                                         for (Edge* e = toPrev1->next, *n = NULL; e != min1; e = n)
01832                                         {
01833                                                 n = e->next;
01834                                                 removeEdgePair(e);
01835                                         }
01836                                 }
01837 
01838                                 if (pendingTail1)
01839                                 {
01840                                         if (toPrev1)
01841                                         {
01842                                                 toPrev1->link(pendingHead1);
01843                                         }
01844                                         else
01845                                         {
01846                                                 min1->prev->link(pendingHead1);
01847                                                 firstNew1 = pendingHead1;
01848                                         }
01849                                         pendingTail1->link(min1);
01850                                         pendingHead1 = NULL;
01851                                         pendingTail1 = NULL;
01852                                 }
01853                                 else if (!toPrev1)
01854                                 {
01855                                         firstNew1 = min1;
01856                                 }
01857 
01858                                 prevPoint = c1->point;
01859                                 c1 = e1->target;
01860                                 toPrev1 = e1->reverse;
01861                         }
01862 
01863                         if ((cmp <= 0) && e0)
01864                         {
01865                                 if (toPrev0)
01866                                 {
01867                                         for (Edge* e = toPrev0->prev, *n = NULL; e != min0; e = n)
01868                                         {
01869                                                 n = e->prev;
01870                                                 removeEdgePair(e);
01871                                         }
01872                                 }
01873 
01874                                 if (pendingTail0)
01875                                 {
01876                                         if (toPrev0)
01877                                         {
01878                                                 pendingHead0->link(toPrev0);
01879                                         }
01880                                         else
01881                                         {
01882                                                 pendingHead0->link(min0->next);
01883                                                 firstNew0 = pendingHead0;
01884                                         }
01885                                         min0->link(pendingTail0);
01886                                         pendingHead0 = NULL;
01887                                         pendingTail0 = NULL;
01888                                 }
01889                                 else if (!toPrev0)
01890                                 {
01891                                         firstNew0 = min0;
01892                                 }
01893 
01894                                 prevPoint = c0->point;
01895                                 c0 = e0->target;
01896                                 toPrev0 = e0->reverse;
01897                         }
01898                 }
01899 
01900                 if ((c0 == first0) && (c1 == first1))
01901                 {
01902                         if (toPrev0 == NULL)
01903                         {
01904                                 pendingHead0->link(pendingTail0);
01905                                 c0->edges = pendingTail0;
01906                         }
01907                         else
01908                         {
01909                                 for (Edge* e = toPrev0->prev, *n = NULL; e != firstNew0; e = n)
01910                                 {
01911                                         n = e->prev;
01912                                         removeEdgePair(e);
01913                                 }
01914                                 if (pendingTail0)
01915                                 {
01916                                         pendingHead0->link(toPrev0);
01917                                         firstNew0->link(pendingTail0);
01918                                 }
01919                         }
01920 
01921                         if (toPrev1 == NULL)
01922                         {
01923                                 pendingTail1->link(pendingHead1);
01924                                 c1->edges = pendingTail1;
01925                         }
01926                         else
01927                         {
01928                                 for (Edge* e = toPrev1->next, *n = NULL; e != firstNew1; e = n)
01929                                 {
01930                                         n = e->next;
01931                                         removeEdgePair(e);
01932                                 }
01933                                 if (pendingTail1)
01934                                 {
01935                                         toPrev1->link(pendingHead1);
01936                                         pendingTail1->link(firstNew1);
01937                                 }
01938                         }
01939                         
01940                         return;
01941                 }
01942 
01943                 firstRun = false;
01944         }
01945 }
01946 
01947 class pointCmp
01948 {
01949         public:
01950 
01951     bool operator() ( const btConvexHullInternal::Point32& p, const btConvexHullInternal::Point32& q ) const
01952                 {
01953                         return (p.y < q.y) || ((p.y == q.y) && ((p.x < q.x) || ((p.x == q.x) && (p.z < q.z))));
01954                 }
01955 };
01956 
01957 void btConvexHullInternal::compute(const void* coords, bool doubleCoords, int stride, int count)
01958 {
01959         btVector3 min(btScalar(1e30), btScalar(1e30), btScalar(1e30)), max(btScalar(-1e30), btScalar(-1e30), btScalar(-1e30));
01960         const char* ptr = (const char*) coords;
01961         if (doubleCoords)
01962         {
01963                 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01964                 {
01965                         const double* v = (const double*) ptr;
01966                         btVector3 p((btScalar) v[0], (btScalar) v[1], (btScalar) v[2]);
01967                         ptr += stride;
01968                         min.setMin(p);
01969                         max.setMax(p);
01970                 }
01971         }
01972         else
01973         {
01974                 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01975                 {
01976                         const float* v = (const float*) ptr;
01977                         btVector3 p(v[0], v[1], v[2]);
01978                         ptr += stride;
01979                         min.setMin(p);
01980                         max.setMax(p);
01981                 }
01982         }
01983 
01984         btVector3 s = max - min;
01985         maxAxis = s.maxAxis();
01986         minAxis = s.minAxis();
01987         if (minAxis == maxAxis)
01988         {
01989                 minAxis = (maxAxis + 1) % 3;
01990         }
01991         medAxis = 3 - maxAxis - minAxis;
01992 
01993         s /= btScalar(10216);
01994         if (((medAxis + 1) % 3) != maxAxis)
01995         {
01996                 s *= -1;
01997         }
01998         scaling = s;
01999 
02000         if (s[0] != 0)
02001         {
02002                 s[0] = btScalar(1) / s[0];
02003         }
02004         if (s[1] != 0)
02005         {
02006                 s[1] = btScalar(1) / s[1];
02007         }
02008         if (s[2] != 0)
02009         {
02010                 s[2] = btScalar(1) / s[2];
02011         }
02012 
02013         center = (min + max) * btScalar(0.5);
02014 
02015         btAlignedObjectArray<Point32> points;
02016         points.resize(count);
02017         ptr = (const char*) coords;
02018         if (doubleCoords)
02019         {
02020                 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
02021                 {
02022                         const double* v = (const double*) ptr;
02023                         btVector3 p((btScalar) v[0], (btScalar) v[1], (btScalar) v[2]);
02024                         ptr += stride;
02025                         p = (p - center) * s;
02026                         points[i].x = (int32_t) p[medAxis];
02027                         points[i].y = (int32_t) p[maxAxis];
02028                         points[i].z = (int32_t) p[minAxis];
02029                         points[i].index = i;
02030                 }
02031         }
02032         else
02033         {
02034                 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
02035                 {
02036                         const float* v = (const float*) ptr;
02037                         btVector3 p(v[0], v[1], v[2]);
02038                         ptr += stride;
02039                         p = (p - center) * s;
02040                         points[i].x = (int32_t) p[medAxis];
02041                         points[i].y = (int32_t) p[maxAxis];
02042                         points[i].z = (int32_t) p[minAxis];
02043                         points[i].index = i;
02044                 }
02045         }
02046         points.quickSort(pointCmp());
02047 
02048         vertexPool.reset();
02049         vertexPool.setArraySize(count);
02050         originalVertices.resize(count);
02051         for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
02052         {
02053                 Vertex* v = vertexPool.newObject();
02054                 v->edges = NULL;
02055                 v->point = points[i];
02056                 v->copy = -1;
02057                 originalVertices[i] = v;
02058         }
02059 
02060         points.clear();
02061 
02062         edgePool.reset();
02063         edgePool.setArraySize(6 * count);
02064 
02065         usedEdgePairs = 0;
02066         maxUsedEdgePairs = 0;
02067 
02068         mergeStamp = -3;
02069 
02070         IntermediateHull hull;
02071         computeInternal(0, count, hull);
02072         vertexList = hull.minXy;
02073 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02074         printf("max. edges %d (3v = %d)", maxUsedEdgePairs, 3 * count);
02075 #endif
02076 }
02077 
02078 btVector3 btConvexHullInternal::toBtVector(const Point32& v)
02079 {
02080         btVector3 p;
02081         p[medAxis] = btScalar(v.x);
02082         p[maxAxis] = btScalar(v.y);
02083         p[minAxis] = btScalar(v.z);
02084         return p * scaling;
02085 }
02086 
02087 btVector3 btConvexHullInternal::getBtNormal(Face* face)
02088 {
02089         return toBtVector(face->dir0).cross(toBtVector(face->dir1)).normalized();
02090 }
02091 
02092 btVector3 btConvexHullInternal::getCoordinates(const Vertex* v)
02093 {
02094         btVector3 p;
02095         p[medAxis] = v->xvalue();
02096         p[maxAxis] = v->yvalue();
02097         p[minAxis] = v->zvalue();
02098         return p * scaling + center;
02099 }
02100 
02101 btScalar btConvexHullInternal::shrink(btScalar amount, btScalar clampAmount)
02102 {
02103         if (!vertexList)
02104         {
02105                 return 0;
02106         }
02107         int stamp = --mergeStamp;
02108         btAlignedObjectArray<Vertex*> stack;
02109         vertexList->copy = stamp;
02110         stack.push_back(vertexList);
02111         btAlignedObjectArray<Face*> faces;
02112 
02113         Point32 ref = vertexList->point;
02114         Int128 hullCenterX(0, 0);
02115         Int128 hullCenterY(0, 0);
02116         Int128 hullCenterZ(0, 0);
02117         Int128 volume(0, 0);
02118 
02119         while (stack.size() > 0)
02120         {
02121                 Vertex* v = stack[stack.size() - 1];
02122                 stack.pop_back();
02123                 Edge* e = v->edges;
02124                 if (e)
02125                 {
02126                         do
02127                         {
02128                                 if (e->target->copy != stamp)
02129                                 {
02130                                         e->target->copy = stamp;
02131                                         stack.push_back(e->target);
02132                                 }
02133                                 if (e->copy != stamp)
02134                                 {
02135                                         Face* face = facePool.newObject();
02136                                         face->init(e->target, e->reverse->prev->target, v);
02137                                         faces.push_back(face);
02138                                         Edge* f = e;
02139 
02140                                         Vertex* a = NULL;
02141                                         Vertex* b = NULL;
02142                                         do
02143                                         {
02144                                                 if (a && b)
02145                                                 {
02146                                                         int64_t vol = (v->point - ref).dot((a->point - ref).cross(b->point - ref));
02147                                                         btAssert(vol >= 0);
02148                                                         Point32 c = v->point + a->point + b->point + ref;
02149                                                         hullCenterX += vol * c.x;
02150                                                         hullCenterY += vol * c.y;
02151                                                         hullCenterZ += vol * c.z;
02152                                                         volume += vol;
02153                                                 }
02154 
02155                                                 btAssert(f->copy != stamp);
02156                                                 f->copy = stamp;
02157                                                 f->face = face;
02158 
02159                                                 a = b;
02160                                                 b = f->target;
02161 
02162                                                 f = f->reverse->prev;
02163                                         } while (f != e);
02164                                 }
02165                                 e = e->next;
02166                         } while (e != v->edges);
02167                 }
02168         }
02169 
02170         if (volume.getSign() <= 0)
02171         {
02172                 return 0;
02173         }
02174 
02175         btVector3 hullCenter;
02176         hullCenter[medAxis] = hullCenterX.toScalar();
02177         hullCenter[maxAxis] = hullCenterY.toScalar();
02178         hullCenter[minAxis] = hullCenterZ.toScalar();
02179         hullCenter /= 4 * volume.toScalar();
02180         hullCenter *= scaling;
02181 
02182         int faceCount = faces.size();
02183 
02184         if (clampAmount > 0)
02185         {
02186                 btScalar minDist = SIMD_INFINITY;
02187                 for (int i = 0; i < faceCount; i++)
02188                 {
02189                         btVector3 normal = getBtNormal(faces[i]);
02190                         btScalar dist = normal.dot(toBtVector(faces[i]->origin) - hullCenter);
02191                         if (dist < minDist)
02192                         {
02193                                 minDist = dist;
02194                         }
02195                 }
02196                 
02197                 if (minDist <= 0)
02198                 {
02199                         return 0;
02200                 }
02201 
02202                 amount = btMin(amount, minDist * clampAmount);
02203         }
02204 
02205         unsigned int seed = 243703;
02206         for (int i = 0; i < faceCount; i++, seed = 1664525 * seed + 1013904223)
02207         {
02208                 btSwap(faces[i], faces[seed % faceCount]);
02209         }
02210 
02211         for (int i = 0; i < faceCount; i++)
02212         {
02213                 if (!shiftFace(faces[i], amount, stack))
02214                 {
02215                         return -amount;
02216                 }
02217         }
02218 
02219         return amount;
02220 }
02221 
02222 bool btConvexHullInternal::shiftFace(Face* face, btScalar amount, btAlignedObjectArray<Vertex*> stack)
02223 {
02224         btVector3 origShift = getBtNormal(face) * -amount;
02225         if (scaling[0] != 0)
02226         {
02227                 origShift[0] /= scaling[0];
02228         }
02229         if (scaling[1] != 0)
02230         {
02231                 origShift[1] /= scaling[1];
02232         }
02233         if (scaling[2] != 0)
02234         {
02235                 origShift[2] /= scaling[2];
02236         }
02237         Point32 shift((int32_t) origShift[medAxis], (int32_t) origShift[maxAxis], (int32_t) origShift[minAxis]);
02238         if (shift.isZero())
02239         {
02240                 return true;
02241         }
02242         Point64 normal = face->getNormal();
02243 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02244         printf("\nShrinking face (%d %d %d) (%d %d %d) (%d %d %d) by (%d %d %d)\n",
02245                                  face->origin.x, face->origin.y, face->origin.z, face->dir0.x, face->dir0.y, face->dir0.z, face->dir1.x, face->dir1.y, face->dir1.z, shift.x, shift.y, shift.z);
02246 #endif
02247         int64_t origDot = face->origin.dot(normal);
02248         Point32 shiftedOrigin = face->origin + shift;
02249         int64_t shiftedDot = shiftedOrigin.dot(normal);
02250         btAssert(shiftedDot <= origDot);
02251         if (shiftedDot >= origDot)
02252         {
02253                 return false;
02254         }
02255 
02256         Edge* intersection = NULL;
02257 
02258         Edge* startEdge = face->nearbyVertex->edges;
02259 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02260         printf("Start edge is ");
02261         startEdge->print();
02262         printf(", normal is (%lld %lld %lld), shifted dot is %lld\n", normal.x, normal.y, normal.z, shiftedDot);
02263 #endif
02264         Rational128 optDot = face->nearbyVertex->dot(normal);
02265         int cmp = optDot.compare(shiftedDot);
02266 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02267         int n = 0;
02268 #endif
02269         if (cmp >= 0)
02270         {
02271                 Edge* e = startEdge;
02272                 do
02273                 {
02274 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02275                         n++;
02276 #endif
02277                         Rational128 dot = e->target->dot(normal);
02278                         btAssert(dot.compare(origDot) <= 0);
02279 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02280                         printf("Moving downwards, edge is ");
02281                         e->print();
02282                         printf(", dot is %f (%f %lld)\n", (float) dot.toScalar(), (float) optDot.toScalar(), shiftedDot);
02283 #endif
02284                         if (dot.compare(optDot) < 0)
02285                         {
02286                                 int c = dot.compare(shiftedDot);
02287                                 optDot = dot;
02288                                 e = e->reverse;
02289                                 startEdge = e;
02290                                 if (c < 0)
02291                                 {
02292                                         intersection = e;
02293                                         break;
02294                                 }
02295                                 cmp = c;
02296                         }
02297                         e = e->prev;
02298                 } while (e != startEdge);
02299 
02300                 if (!intersection)
02301                 {
02302                         return false;
02303                 }
02304         }
02305         else
02306         {
02307                 Edge* e = startEdge;
02308                 do
02309                 {
02310 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02311                         n++;
02312 #endif
02313                         Rational128 dot = e->target->dot(normal);
02314                         btAssert(dot.compare(origDot) <= 0);
02315 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02316                         printf("Moving upwards, edge is ");
02317                         e->print();
02318                         printf(", dot is %f (%f %lld)\n", (float) dot.toScalar(), (float) optDot.toScalar(), shiftedDot);
02319 #endif
02320                         if (dot.compare(optDot) > 0)
02321                         {
02322                                 cmp = dot.compare(shiftedDot);
02323                                 if (cmp >= 0)
02324                                 {
02325                                         intersection = e;
02326                                         break;
02327                                 }
02328                                 optDot = dot;
02329                                 e = e->reverse;
02330                                 startEdge = e;
02331                         }
02332                         e = e->prev;
02333                 } while (e != startEdge);
02334                 
02335                 if (!intersection)
02336                 {
02337                         return true;
02338                 }
02339         }
02340 
02341 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02342         printf("Needed %d iterations to find initial intersection\n", n);
02343 #endif
02344 
02345         if (cmp == 0)
02346         {
02347                 Edge* e = intersection->reverse->next;
02348 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02349                 n = 0;
02350 #endif
02351                 while (e->target->dot(normal).compare(shiftedDot) <= 0)
02352                 {
02353 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02354                         n++;
02355 #endif
02356                         e = e->next;
02357                         if (e == intersection->reverse)
02358                         {
02359                                 return true;
02360                         }
02361 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02362                         printf("Checking for outwards edge, current edge is ");
02363                         e->print();
02364                         printf("\n");
02365 #endif
02366                 }
02367 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02368                 printf("Needed %d iterations to check for complete containment\n", n);
02369 #endif
02370         }
02371         
02372         Edge* firstIntersection = NULL;
02373         Edge* faceEdge = NULL;
02374         Edge* firstFaceEdge = NULL;
02375 
02376 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02377         int m = 0;
02378 #endif
02379         while (true)
02380         {
02381 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02382                 m++;
02383 #endif
02384 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02385                 printf("Intersecting edge is ");
02386                 intersection->print();
02387                 printf("\n");
02388 #endif
02389                 if (cmp == 0)
02390                 {
02391                         Edge* e = intersection->reverse->next;
02392                         startEdge = e;
02393 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02394                         n = 0;
02395 #endif
02396                         while (true)
02397                         {
02398 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02399                                 n++;
02400 #endif
02401                                 if (e->target->dot(normal).compare(shiftedDot) >= 0)
02402                                 {
02403                                         break;
02404                                 }
02405                                 intersection = e->reverse;
02406                                 e = e->next;
02407                                 if (e == startEdge)
02408                                 {
02409                                         return true;
02410                                 }
02411                         }
02412 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02413                         printf("Needed %d iterations to advance intersection\n", n);
02414 #endif
02415                 }
02416 
02417 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02418                 printf("Advanced intersecting edge to ");
02419                 intersection->print();
02420                 printf(", cmp = %d\n", cmp);
02421 #endif
02422 
02423                 if (!firstIntersection)
02424                 {
02425                         firstIntersection = intersection;
02426                 }
02427                 else if (intersection == firstIntersection)
02428                 {
02429                         break;
02430                 }
02431 
02432                 int prevCmp = cmp;
02433                 Edge* prevIntersection = intersection;
02434                 Edge* prevFaceEdge = faceEdge;
02435 
02436                 Edge* e = intersection->reverse;
02437 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02438                 n = 0;
02439 #endif
02440                 while (true)
02441                 {
02442 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02443                         n++;
02444 #endif
02445                         e = e->reverse->prev;
02446                         btAssert(e != intersection->reverse);
02447                         cmp = e->target->dot(normal).compare(shiftedDot);
02448 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02449                         printf("Testing edge ");
02450                         e->print();
02451                         printf(" -> cmp = %d\n", cmp);
02452 #endif
02453                         if (cmp >= 0)
02454                         {
02455                                 intersection = e;
02456                                 break;
02457                         }
02458                 }
02459 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02460                 printf("Needed %d iterations to find other intersection of face\n", n);
02461 #endif
02462 
02463                 if (cmp > 0)
02464                 {
02465                         Vertex* removed = intersection->target;
02466                         e = intersection->reverse;
02467                         if (e->prev == e)
02468                         {
02469                                 removed->edges = NULL;
02470                         }
02471                         else
02472                         {
02473                                 removed->edges = e->prev;
02474                                 e->prev->link(e->next);
02475                                 e->link(e);
02476                         }
02477 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02478                         printf("1: Removed part contains (%d %d %d)\n", removed->point.x, removed->point.y, removed->point.z);
02479 #endif
02480                         
02481                         Point64 n0 = intersection->face->getNormal();
02482                         Point64 n1 = intersection->reverse->face->getNormal();
02483                         int64_t m00 = face->dir0.dot(n0);
02484                         int64_t m01 = face->dir1.dot(n0);
02485                         int64_t m10 = face->dir0.dot(n1);
02486                         int64_t m11 = face->dir1.dot(n1);
02487                         int64_t r0 = (intersection->face->origin - shiftedOrigin).dot(n0);
02488                         int64_t r1 = (intersection->reverse->face->origin - shiftedOrigin).dot(n1);
02489                         Int128 det = Int128::mul(m00, m11) - Int128::mul(m01, m10);
02490                         btAssert(det.getSign() != 0);
02491                         Vertex* v = vertexPool.newObject();
02492                         v->point.index = -1;
02493                         v->copy = -1;
02494                         v->point128 = PointR128(Int128::mul(face->dir0.x * r0, m11) - Int128::mul(face->dir0.x * r1, m01)
02495                                                                                                                         + Int128::mul(face->dir1.x * r1, m00) - Int128::mul(face->dir1.x * r0, m10) + det * shiftedOrigin.x,
02496                                                                                                                         Int128::mul(face->dir0.y * r0, m11) - Int128::mul(face->dir0.y * r1, m01)
02497                                                                                                                         + Int128::mul(face->dir1.y * r1, m00) - Int128::mul(face->dir1.y * r0, m10) + det * shiftedOrigin.y,
02498                                                                                                                         Int128::mul(face->dir0.z * r0, m11) - Int128::mul(face->dir0.z * r1, m01)
02499                                                                                                                         + Int128::mul(face->dir1.z * r1, m00) - Int128::mul(face->dir1.z * r0, m10) + det * shiftedOrigin.z,
02500                                                                                                                         det);
02501                         v->point.x = (int32_t) v->point128.xvalue();
02502                         v->point.y = (int32_t) v->point128.yvalue();
02503                         v->point.z = (int32_t) v->point128.zvalue();
02504                         intersection->target = v;
02505                         v->edges = e;
02506 
02507                         stack.push_back(v);
02508                         stack.push_back(removed);
02509                         stack.push_back(NULL);
02510                 }
02511 
02512                 if (cmp || prevCmp || (prevIntersection->reverse->next->target != intersection->target))
02513                 {
02514                         faceEdge = newEdgePair(prevIntersection->target, intersection->target);
02515                         if (prevCmp == 0)
02516                         {
02517                                 faceEdge->link(prevIntersection->reverse->next);
02518                         }
02519                         if ((prevCmp == 0) || prevFaceEdge)
02520                         {
02521                                 prevIntersection->reverse->link(faceEdge);
02522                         }
02523                         if (cmp == 0)
02524                         {
02525                                 intersection->reverse->prev->link(faceEdge->reverse);
02526                         }
02527                         faceEdge->reverse->link(intersection->reverse);
02528                 }
02529                 else
02530                 {
02531                         faceEdge = prevIntersection->reverse->next;
02532                 }
02533 
02534                 if (prevFaceEdge)
02535                 {
02536                         if (prevCmp > 0)
02537                         {
02538                                 faceEdge->link(prevFaceEdge->reverse);
02539                         }
02540                         else if (faceEdge != prevFaceEdge->reverse)
02541                         {
02542                                 stack.push_back(prevFaceEdge->target);
02543                                 while (faceEdge->next != prevFaceEdge->reverse)
02544                                 {
02545                                         Vertex* removed = faceEdge->next->target;
02546                                         removeEdgePair(faceEdge->next);
02547                                         stack.push_back(removed);
02548 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02549                                         printf("2: Removed part contains (%d %d %d)\n", removed->point.x, removed->point.y, removed->point.z);
02550 #endif
02551                                 }
02552                                 stack.push_back(NULL);
02553                         }
02554                 }
02555                 faceEdge->face = face;
02556                 faceEdge->reverse->face = intersection->face;
02557 
02558                 if (!firstFaceEdge)
02559                 {
02560                         firstFaceEdge = faceEdge;
02561                 }
02562         }
02563 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02564         printf("Needed %d iterations to process all intersections\n", m);
02565 #endif
02566 
02567         if (cmp > 0)
02568         {
02569                 firstFaceEdge->reverse->target = faceEdge->target;
02570                 firstIntersection->reverse->link(firstFaceEdge);
02571                 firstFaceEdge->link(faceEdge->reverse);
02572         }
02573         else if (firstFaceEdge != faceEdge->reverse)
02574         {
02575                 stack.push_back(faceEdge->target);
02576                 while (firstFaceEdge->next != faceEdge->reverse)
02577                 {
02578                         Vertex* removed = firstFaceEdge->next->target;
02579                         removeEdgePair(firstFaceEdge->next);
02580                         stack.push_back(removed);
02581 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02582                         printf("3: Removed part contains (%d %d %d)\n", removed->point.x, removed->point.y, removed->point.z);
02583 #endif
02584                 }
02585                 stack.push_back(NULL);
02586         }
02587 
02588         btAssert(stack.size() > 0);
02589         vertexList = stack[0];
02590 
02591 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02592         printf("Removing part\n");
02593 #endif
02594 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02595         n = 0;
02596 #endif
02597         int pos = 0;
02598         while (pos < stack.size())
02599         {
02600                 int end = stack.size();
02601                 while (pos < end)
02602                 {
02603                         Vertex* kept = stack[pos++];
02604 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02605                         kept->print();
02606 #endif
02607                         bool deeper = false;
02608                         Vertex* removed;
02609                         while ((removed = stack[pos++]) != NULL)
02610                         {
02611 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02612                                 n++;
02613 #endif
02614                                 kept->receiveNearbyFaces(removed);
02615                                 while (removed->edges)
02616                                 {
02617                                         if (!deeper)
02618                                         {
02619                                                 deeper = true;
02620                                                 stack.push_back(kept);
02621                                         }
02622                                         stack.push_back(removed->edges->target);
02623                                         removeEdgePair(removed->edges);
02624                                 }
02625                         }
02626                         if (deeper)
02627                         {
02628                                 stack.push_back(NULL);
02629                         }
02630                 }
02631         }
02632 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02633         printf("Needed %d iterations to remove part\n", n);
02634 #endif
02635 
02636         stack.resize(0);
02637         face->origin = shiftedOrigin;
02638 
02639         return true;
02640 }
02641 
02642 
02643 static int getVertexCopy(btConvexHullInternal::Vertex* vertex, btAlignedObjectArray<btConvexHullInternal::Vertex*>& vertices)
02644 {
02645         int index = vertex->copy;
02646         if (index < 0)
02647         {
02648                 index = vertices.size();
02649                 vertex->copy = index;
02650                 vertices.push_back(vertex);
02651 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02652                 printf("Vertex %d gets index *%d\n", vertex->point.index, index);
02653 #endif
02654         }
02655         return index;
02656 }
02657 
02658 btScalar btConvexHullComputer::compute(const void* coords, bool doubleCoords, int stride, int count, btScalar shrink, btScalar shrinkClamp)
02659 {
02660         if (count <= 0)
02661         {
02662                 vertices.clear();
02663                 edges.clear();
02664                 faces.clear();
02665                 return 0;
02666         }
02667 
02668         btConvexHullInternal hull;
02669         hull.compute(coords, doubleCoords, stride, count);
02670 
02671         btScalar shift = 0;
02672         if ((shrink > 0) && ((shift = hull.shrink(shrink, shrinkClamp)) < 0))
02673         {
02674                 vertices.clear();
02675                 edges.clear();
02676                 faces.clear();
02677                 return shift;
02678         }
02679 
02680         vertices.resize(0);
02681         edges.resize(0);
02682         faces.resize(0);
02683 
02684         btAlignedObjectArray<btConvexHullInternal::Vertex*> oldVertices;
02685         getVertexCopy(hull.vertexList, oldVertices);
02686         int copied = 0;
02687         while (copied < oldVertices.size())
02688         {
02689                 btConvexHullInternal::Vertex* v = oldVertices[copied];
02690                 vertices.push_back(hull.getCoordinates(v));
02691                 btConvexHullInternal::Edge* firstEdge = v->edges;
02692                 if (firstEdge)
02693                 {
02694                         int firstCopy = -1;
02695                         int prevCopy = -1;
02696                         btConvexHullInternal::Edge* e = firstEdge;
02697                         do
02698                         {
02699                                 if (e->copy < 0)
02700                                 {
02701                                         int s = edges.size();
02702                                         edges.push_back(Edge());
02703                                         edges.push_back(Edge());
02704                                         Edge* c = &edges[s];
02705                                         Edge* r = &edges[s + 1];
02706                                         e->copy = s;
02707                                         e->reverse->copy = s + 1;
02708                                         c->reverse = 1;
02709                                         r->reverse = -1;
02710                                         c->targetVertex = getVertexCopy(e->target, oldVertices);
02711                                         r->targetVertex = copied;
02712 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02713                                         printf("      CREATE: Vertex *%d has edge to *%d\n", copied, c->getTargetVertex());
02714 #endif
02715                                 }
02716                                 if (prevCopy >= 0)
02717                                 {
02718                                         edges[e->copy].next = prevCopy - e->copy;
02719                                 }
02720                                 else
02721                                 {
02722                                         firstCopy = e->copy;
02723                                 }
02724                                 prevCopy = e->copy;
02725                                 e = e->next;
02726                         } while (e != firstEdge);
02727                         edges[firstCopy].next = prevCopy - firstCopy;
02728                 }
02729                 copied++;
02730         }
02731 
02732         for (int i = 0; i < copied; i++)
02733         {
02734                 btConvexHullInternal::Vertex* v = oldVertices[i];
02735                 btConvexHullInternal::Edge* firstEdge = v->edges;
02736                 if (firstEdge)
02737                 {
02738                         btConvexHullInternal::Edge* e = firstEdge;
02739                         do
02740                         {
02741                                 if (e->copy >= 0)
02742                                 {
02743 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02744                                         printf("Vertex *%d has edge to *%d\n", i, edges[e->copy].getTargetVertex());
02745 #endif
02746                                         faces.push_back(e->copy);
02747                                         btConvexHullInternal::Edge* f = e;
02748                                         do
02749                                         {
02750 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02751                                                 printf("   Face *%d\n", edges[f->copy].getTargetVertex());
02752 #endif
02753                                                 f->copy = -1;
02754                                                 f = f->reverse->prev;
02755                                         } while (f != e);
02756                                 }
02757                                 e = e->next;
02758                         } while (e != firstEdge);
02759                 }
02760         }
02761 
02762         return shift;
02763 }
